summary: MY WIFES HONDA PILOT 2011 HAS A SEVERE SHUTTER WHEN EXCELARATING FROM A DEAD STOP UP TO 50 MPH. IT NOW HAS APPROXIMATELY 119000 ON IT BUT HAS BEEN DOING THIS FOR ABOUT A YEAR AND THIS SHUTTER OR MISSING CONDITION IS GETTING WORSE. I HAVE READ REVIEWS AND SEEMS TO BE A PROBLEM HONDA HAS HAD FOR SOME TIME. WHAT CAN HONDA DO TO CORRECT THIS PROBLEM FOR ALL OF US?
